features.legitimacy.text-1: In June 2022, the Kingdom of Thailand fully legalized the production, storage and use of cannabis
features.legitimacy.text-2: Green Grow Pharmaceuticals is officially registered in Thailand as a legal entity. We have all the necessary licenses and pay taxes in full
features.potential.text-1: Green Grow Pharmaceuticals produces elite cannabis in Thailand. Products of similar quality are introduced from abroad and cost 10 times as much!
features.potential.text-2: Thailand is a rapidly growing market for cannabis-containing products. We cooperate with a large number of outlets in Thailand and plan to export to the USA and Canada
features.potential.text-3: We conduct research and selection work to improve the quality and reduce the price of the product.
features.sales.text: We grow elite varieties of cannabis with the use of high technology, and sell it wholesale and retail in Thailand, the USA and Canada
features.science.text: Industrial complex with an area of more than 1,500 sq. m. Productivity from 4,600 plants per cycle
